page.title: 08KILBURN(DERBY)AREA EDUCATION
page.content: Written by an 11_year_old I get up for school at 8 o'clock and arrive there at about quater to 9. When we have gone in and called the dimner register, we go down to assembly. I like it best when another class takes this. after assembly we usally do Peak Maths. That might be number work, measuring,mgraphs or dealing with shapes. After playtime we usally do some sort of english. I like writing stories best, and listening to other people's. Then we have some story and go to dinner. I stay for school dinners. After dinner_play we usually do reading for a bit, then some topic, p.e. or art. I like doing craft on Thursday best; we make things with wood, material or paper mache. I like P.E. too, especially when we play football.
